name: Hovercraft Havoc
description:
Reach the landing pad before you run out of fuel!

Hold left click to boost yourself away from the direction you are pointing. Use right click to have a burst of power to break through fragile rocks or to stabilize your velocity.

Art: KrisDa

Coding & SFX: ShawnTheSheep

Music: Beauty Flow by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5025-beauty-flow
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
